Text.Name: OutSpread_Give1
Text.Desc: It was a fine day. [NAME] led the disciples to the street and distributed food to the passersby.

Text.Name: OutSpread_Give2
Text.Desc: It was a fine day. [NAME] led disciples to the street and started giving alms to passersby. There were many a beggar asking for money on the side of the road.

Text.Name: OutSpread_Give3
Text.Desc: It was a fine day. [NAME] led disciples to the street and started giving alms to passersby. They saw a stone bridge had collapsed, and people no longer walk through here.

Text.Name: OutSpread_Give4
Text.Desc: It was a fine day. [NAME] led disciples to the street and started giving alms to passersby. They saw two villagers arguing over a dog.

Text.Name: OutSpread_Give5
Text.Desc: [NAME] led the disciples to the street and started giving alms to passersby. They saw two young gentlemen were fighting over a woman.

Text.Name: OutSpread_Give6
Text.Desc: [NAME] led the disciples to the street and started giving alms to passersby. They saw two big men fighting each other. A passerby explained that it was because one man planted a tree, but its fruits ended up falling into the other guy's home and he was not willing to give them.

Text.Name: OutSpread_Give7
Text.Desc: [NAME] was preparing to do charity work, when a woman exquisitely dressed approached [NAME]'s place crying, and said her child had gone missing.

Text.Name: OutSpread_Give8
Text.Desc: [NAME] was preparing to do charity work, when a man rushed into the hall begging [NAME] to save his dying wife.

Text.Name: OutSpread_Give9
Text.Desc: [NAME] had wandered to a rather distant place. A group of bandits happened to be passing by.

Text.Name: OutSpread_Give10
Text.Desc: [NAME] came across the forces of [SCHOOL0], and saw that they were giving alms to passersby.

Text.Name: OutSpread_Give11
Text.Desc: [NAME] came across the forces of [SCHOOL0], and saw that they were preaching.

Text.Name: OutSpread_Give12
Text.Desc: [NAME] came across the forces of [SCHOOL0], and saw that they were holding a fasting ceremony.

Text.Name: OutSpread_Give13
Text.Desc: [NAME] led the disciples to the street and started giving alms to passersby. They came across a broken wooden house, its owner is handicapped and unable to repair it.

Text.Name: OutSpread_Give14
Text.Desc: [NAME] led the disciples to the street and started giving alms to passersby. They saw a man wearing foreign costume swindling passersby.

Text.Name: OutSpread_Give15
Text.Desc: [NAME] led the disciples to the street and started giving alms to passersby. They passed by two taverns facing each other on opposite sides of the road, of which the waiters were arguing over business issues.

Text.Name: OutSpread_Give16
Text.Desc: [NAME] led the disciples to the street and started giving alms to passersby. They encountered a group of refugees.

Text.Name: OutSpread_Give17
Text.Desc: [NAME] led the disciples to the street and started giving alms to passersby. They saw a dying man who was severely ill on the side of the road, who pleaded to [NAME] to put him out of his misery.

Text.Name: OutSpread_Give18
Text.Desc: [NAME] led the disciples to the street and started giving alms to passersby. They accidentally touched an old man in the crowd, who immediately fell onto the ground and started shouting, "Ouch! Somebody broke my leg! This is the one! ".

Text.Name: OutSpread_Sermon1
Text.Desc: It was a bright day, and [NAME] was standing at the entrance to the street, preparing to preach.

Text.Name: OutSpread_Sermon2
Text.Desc: It was a bright day, and [NAME] was preaching. Suddenly a big man came up and exclaimed: "What a load of nonsense! "

Text.Name: OutSpread_Sermon3
Text.Desc: It was a bright day, and [NAME] was preaching. A scholar came up and said that what [NAME] was saying was wrong... That didn't go over well.

Text.Name: OutSpread_Sermon4
Text.Desc: It was a bright day, and [NAME] was preaching. A middle-aged woman kept clapping in an obnoxious way, but she is not a follower.

Text.Name: OutSpread_Secret1
Text.Desc: It was a bright day, and [NAME] walked into the secret pavilion to hatch a plot.

Text.Name: OutSpread_Secret2
Text.Desc: [NAME] discovered that [SCHOOL0] was giving alms and decided to interfere.

Text.Name: OutSpread_Secret3
Text.Desc: [NAME] discovered that [SCHOOL0] was preparing to preach...an idea came to mind like a bolt of lightning.

Text.Name: OutSpread_Secret4
Text.Desc: [NAME] discovered that [SCHOOL0] was holding a fasting ceremony and decided to interfere.

Text.Name: OutSpread_Disp1
Text.Desc: It was a bright day, and [NAME] was in the Discipline Temple preparing for an Abstinence Ceremony.

Text.Name: OutSpread_Disp2
Text.Desc: [NAME] saw that people were all living a lavish lifestyle and decided to perform an Abstinence Ceremony.

Text.Name: OutSpread_Disp3
Text.Desc: [NAME] saw that rich people were living lavishly while the poor die on the side of the road, and decided to perform an Abstinence Ceremony.

Text.Name: OutSpread_Disp4
Text.Desc: [NAME] saw that outlaws were running the town and hatred filled the city, and decided to perform an Abstinence Ceremony.

Text.Name: OutSpread_Disp5
Text.Desc: [NAME] saw that dishonest merchants and robbers were running the town, and decided to perform an Abstinence Ceremony.

Text.Name: OutSpread_God1
Text.Desc: Agent [NAME] decided that today was a good day to let Shendao disciples perform a miracle here.
